message.entry: {0} must be a scalar or a 2-element vector.
Specified layer for {0} must be a single layer.
{0} must either be a string, char, or a layer object.
The layer specified for {0} must have a single input and single output.
Number of shared blocks must be less than or equal to total number of residual blocks.
Input sizes must be evenly divisible by 2^(Number of downsampling blocks).
Input image dlInputImage should be a formatted dlarray.
Input Network is not a UNIT generator dlnetwork.
